channel.title: Off Topic (new posts)
channel.description: Posts in the forum category "Off Topic" - Topics that otherwise don't fit in any of the existing topics.

item.title: Merry Ninja Xmas: Re: Merry Ninja Xmas
item.content:encoded: Happy new year tho.

item.title: Merry Ninja Xmas: Re: Merry Ninja Xmas
item.content:encoded: Merry christmas to you too! Been a lovely year with much fun sitting at home playing slots and looking for new exciting online casinos.

item.title: Merry Ninja Xmas: Re: Merry Ninja Xmas
item.content:encoded: Merry Christmas of 2019! I played some neat christmas slots just now, so I am feeling the holiday spirit!

item.title: Router Broke: Re: Router Broke
item.content:encoded:
Well routers are really destined to breakdown after some time and they are only as good as long as they are working properly. And most of the time, you just have to get a new one when they start to fall apart.

I have a Linksys one with me for almost 3 years now and it still is running smoothly. Though before this, I had an Aztech router which I got for about 1/3 the price of Linksys and it got me to 2 years!

item.title: What songs do you have on youre mp3 player =D: Re: What songs do you have on youre mp3 player =D
item.content:encoded:
Quite funny that you tried to list what you have on your MP3 player. I have quite a lot with me and that is great and all that.

I have a variety of songs on my mp3 player which can range from a few pop songs and surely a lot of anime songs in it as well.

I actually filled up about 10gb on my iPhone's 32gb only for songs and that is really great as I love listening to a variety.

item.title: Video downloads?: Re: Video downloads?
item.content:encoded:
It is quite sad that the usual portals where I stream and download some videos had to be brought down because of that anti piracy act and that proved to be really a burden to deal with.

I love using Xillsoft as well though there are some options that do not work well with one another leaving you with a video that is not in sync with one another, for some reason. Though you could pretty much go with their recommended settings without any problem.

item.content:encoded: I would just like to say that my wiki status has now moved up to guru ^_^ I thank you all to those who asked questions and gave suggestions for the wiki. This means a lot =D Let us continue making this wiki great

item.title: Video downloads?: Re: Video downloads?
item.content:encoded: I use a program called "Xiisoft downloader" It will download videos straight off of youtube. The only problem is it makes the .flv files (flash). But then i use a converter program to turn from .Flv to .mpg or .avi. google that to find out.

item.title: jounin accesment: Re: jounin accesment
item.content:encoded: But it is also recomended that you DO reaper missions at special jonin. And some of the boosts as reaper missions also help in the examâ€¦.. well, i'm an extremely high special jonin, and i refuse to be jonin XD lol

item.title: jounin accesment: Re: jounin accesment
item.content:encoded: btw guys it say you need to be over 40, which means you have to be 41 i took it. if your going for the reaper thing do it after you do jonin exam because you need the jonin boosts they help alot

item.title: Need something...from someone: Re: Need something...from someone
item.content:encoded: Thread locked. The wiki forum (any forum here) isn't the right place to beg for items.

item.title: Need something...from someone: Re: Need something...from someone
item.content:encoded:
A Billy Bucket isn't going to help you get another bloodline.

Emosuke 3 isn't going to help you get another bloodline either.

You need to complete Reaper/Trade/Revenge.

Anyway, there are no items that I currently desire. I only need villagers.

item.title: Need something...from someone: Re: Need something...from someone
item.content:encoded:
well i would get one but i can't get A-ranks yet.
still sp. jonin
and i need to get another bloodline.
and i can't join your village cuz as soon as i turn jonin and get like 100000 ryo i am leaving mine and getting my own.
but if you need an item then i can try to get one for youâ€¦so long as it can be sent.
